parameter.name: randomSeed
parameter.displayName: Default Random Seed

parameter.name: OUTPUT_PATH
parameter.displayName: 000 -OUTPUT_PATH- Path in which data is written

parameter.name: CONSOLE_OUTPUT
parameter.displayName: 001 -CONSOLE_OUTPUT- Write the log output also in the console

parameter.name: PROTOCOL_TYPE
parameter.displayName: 002 -PROTOCOL_TYPE- Choice of which implementation to use.

parameter.name: MEAN_CREATE
parameter.displayName: 100 -MEAN_CREATE- Avg. time between the creation of two nodes using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_CREATE
parameter.displayName: 101 -VAR_CREATE- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two nodes using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_KILL
parameter.displayName: 102 -MEAN_KILL- Avg. time between the removal of a two nodes using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_KILL
parameter.displayName: 103 -VAR_KILL- Std. dev of the time between the removal of two nodes using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 104 -MEAN_EVENT- Avg. time between the creation of two events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 105 -VAR_EVENT- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_FOLLOW
parameter.displayName: 106 -MEAN_FOLLOW- Avg. time between the creation of two follow events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_FOLLOW
parameter.displayName: 107 -VAR_FOLLOW- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two follow events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_UNFOLLOW
parameter.displayName: 108 -MEAN_UNFOLLOW- Avg. time between the creation of two unfollow events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_UNFOLLOW
parameter.displayName: 109 -VAR_UNFOLLOW- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two unfollow events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_BLOCK
parameter.displayName: 110 -MEAN_BLOCK- Avg. time between the creation of two block events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_BLOCK
parameter.displayName: 111 -VAR_BLOCK- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two block events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_UNBLOCK
parameter.displayName: 112 -MEAN_UNBLOCK- Avg. time between the creation of two unblock events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_UNBLOCK
parameter.displayName: 113 -VAR_UNBLOCK- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two unblock events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_GOOFFLINE
parameter.displayName: 120 -MEAN_GOOFFLINE_DELAY- Avg. time after between two GoOffline events

parameter.name: VAR_GOOFFLINE
parameter.displayName: 121 -VAR_GOOFFLINE_DELAY- Std. dev of the time between two GoOffline events

parameter.name: MEAN_RECREATE_DELAY
parameter.displayName: 122 -MEAN_RECREATE_DELAY- Avg. time after which a temporarily offline node gets back online

parameter.name: VAR_RECREATE_DELAY
parameter.displayName: 123 -VAR_RECREATE_DELAY- Std. dev of time after which a temporarily offline node gets back online

parameter.name: INITIAL_NODE_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 130 -INITIAL_NODE_SIZE- Size of the network at time 0

parameter.name: MAX_NODE_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 131 -MAX_NODE_SIZE- Maximum number of nodes allowed in the network

parameter.name: MEAN_IDENTITIES_PER_NODE
parameter.displayName: 132 -MEAN_IDENTITIES_PER_NODE- Mean number of identities per nodes using gamma distribution

parameter.name: VAR_IDENTITIES_PER_NODE
parameter.displayName: 133 -VAR_IDENTITIES_PER_NODE- Std. dev of number of identities per nodes using gamma distribution

parameter.name: MIN_FOLLOWED_PER_NODE
parameter.displayName: 134 -MIN_FOLLOWED_PER_NODE- Min number of follows at initialization per node using uniform distribution

parameter.name: MAX_FOLLOWED_PER_NODE
parameter.displayName: 135 -MAX_FOLLOWED_PER_NODE- Max number of follows at initialization per nodes using uniform distribution

parameter.name: STOP_TIME
parameter.displayName: 140 -STOP_TIME- Time at which to automatically stop the simulation

parameter.name: PROPAGATION_SPEED
parameter.displayName: 200 -PROPAGATION_SPEED- Speed of propagation of the perturbation

parameter.name: PROCESSING_DELAY
parameter.displayName: 201 -PROCESSING_DELAY- Mean delay needed to process and then retransmit a packet

parameter.name: UPDATE_INTERVAL
parameter.displayName: 300 -UPDATE_INTERVAL- Interval after which a new update is triggered

parameter.name: DISPLAY_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 400 -DISPLAY_SIZE- Size of the display
